text: Anatoly Ivanovich Savin (born 6 April 1920 in Ostashkov, Russia - 27 March 2016) was a Russian scientist.Поздравление А.И.Савину — Президент России He is a specialist in the field of information and control automation systems. He is also a doctor in Technical Science. Savin is the chairman of the Council on the problems of image processing and the scientific director of OJSC. ==References== ==Other websites== * Интервью с Савиным * На сайте Концерн ПВО «Алмаз-Антей» * На сайте Биографический центр * На сайте ЦНИИ «Комета» Category:1920 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Russian computer scientists
title: Anatoly Savin
